page.title: 18SURVEY QUESTIONNAIRE DOUNE
page.content: 1 HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED IN DOUNE? a)ancestors before me 10% b)since childhood c)less than 15 years 2 DO YOU WORK LOCALLY? a)yes 40% b)no 40% * 3 DO YOU TRAVEL AWAY FROM DOUNE? a)by car 58%b)by bus 12%c)not often30% 4 HOW OLD IS YOUR HOUSE? a)100yrs+30%b)15-100yrs30%c)0-15yrs40% 5 DO YOU OWN ? a)a British car 40%b)a foreign car35% c)no car 25% 6DO YOU OWN ? a)a British T.V.60%b)a foreign T.V.35% c) no T.V. 5% 7SHOPPING IN DOUNE a)I find local shops good for everyday purchases 55% b)I shop for my family in a nearby main centre 45% c)Town for clothes/furniture etc.6%
